mapper.select: select sr.id, sr.code, sr.name from sys_role sr left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id left join sys_user su on su.id = sur.user_id where su.id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT sr.* FROM sys_resource sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr ON srr.resource_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_role sro ON sro.id = srr.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = sro.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id WHERE sr.type IN ('MENU') AND su.id = #{userId} ORDER BY sr.position
SELECT DISTINCT srp.perm FROM sys_role_perm srp LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND srp.perm_type = 3
SELECT DISTINCT srp.perm FROM sys_role_perm srp LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND srp.perm_type = 4
